0.1.name: wordpress/flash-image-carousel
0.1.description:
With this plugin you can create photo galleries or menus from the images in a folder. To display the plugin in your Posts type [flash image carousel ID], where ID is the carousel ID.

For create and configure the carousels press in your Wordpress admin: Settings->Flash carousel.

If the plugin does not work, try downloading from http://www.webpsilon.com/wordpress-plugins/flash-image-carousel/
